actions.text: Measure called up by unanimous consent in Senate.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A concurrent resolution providing for certain corrections to be made in the enrollment of Senate Joint Resolution 108 to validate the effectiveness of certain plans for the use or distribution of funds appropriated to pay judgments awarded to Indian tribes or groups.

summary.text: Makes corrections in the enrollment of S.J. Res. 108 (Distribution of funds appropriated to pay judgments awarded to Indian tribes or groups).

titles.title: A concurrent resolution providing for certain corrections to be made in the enrollment of Senate Joint Resolution 108 to validate the effectiveness of certain plans for the use or distribution of funds appropriated to pay judgments awarded to Indian tribes or groups.
